none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 19, 2013 Description from Terminal Escape:
Further proof that the world of undiscovered and underappreciated '80s hardcore is vast...and well worth searching. East coast hardcore circa 1988, weaned on 7 SECONDS, MDC and with a strong ear to '80s UK punk. These songs are just catchy as hell. BLATANT DISREGARD
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-iLbH5VTlRGg/UmBYy7O61yI/AAAAAAAAI0s/FilHTngqlAg/s1600/blatant+disregard+cover+copy.jpg //2.bp.blogspot.com/-AFyPgpWYQaY/UmBZ4CQ6I8I/AAAAAAAAI00/5QSu_NNq8MI/s1600/blatant+disregard+copy.jpg

seo.title: Blatant Disregard - Blatant Disregard demo 1988 - Terminal Escape
